overview:
outstanding value for money services for web design & development, flash design, Flash based RidhiSolutions.com is a website & Software development company that specializes in providing website, web-site re-design and maintenance, e-commerce solutions, corporate style graphics creations and software development.

We develop

Simple Web sites (HTML only)

Web sites with Flash and sound

Web sites with Shopping Cart and payment gateways

Web sites for product display

Web Applications for Sales management and Order placement

Content Management Web Applications

Customer Relations Management Web Applications

Desktop Applications for Office, Factory Management

Desktop Applications for Hospital & Clinic management

Inventory Management

Our web design team can provide your company with a corporate identity placing your company one step ahead of its competitors. Personal service is paramount and extends throughout the construction of your web site, including after sales service to ensure your web site is a successful investment.

We have some typical options packages available to suit most budgets and requirements. Prices for our service start from only $99 a complete web site, and our team will work with you to produce a site that you will be happy with. Alternatively, we can give you a web site design proposal based on any fixed budget which you specify.

Thanks for your time and efforts in reading my very descriptive message and i hope this may be easy for you get all required details.
